attributes.action: Increase the speed limit on motorways to 80 M.P.H.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the increase in technology in both road and car design it seems strange to keep the same speed limits that where introduced in the early 1960`s when most cars had drum brakes all round andlittle or no driver potection.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
